WEIGHING FACTORS
Our discussion has brought us to the following point: Disagreements con-
cerning abortion in general cannot be reduced to a yes-no dispute. Most op-
ponents  of  abortion  acknowledge  that  abortion  is  permissible  in  some
(though very few) cases. Most defenders of abortion admit that there are
some (though not restrictively many) limitations on when abortion is per-
missible. Where people place themselves on this continuum does not de-
pend on any simple a
